title: 'This is how we f**k it up': Girl, 4,hilariously mispronounces fork and accidentally drops f-word
text:
A little girl misheard 'fork' and accidentally dropped the f-bomb instead as she told her mother how she eats her pasta.

Alexandra Gabriel, known as Lexi, four, was having tagliatelle with older sister Jessica, six, when she dropped the f-bomb at the dinner table in Margate, Kent.

Her mother Victoria, 36, filmed the hilarious moment which shows mischievous Lexi twirling pasta on her fork before saying: 'Look, this is how we f**k it up.'

Mischievous Alexandra Gabriel,four, known as Lexi, eating her tagliatelle at the dinner table with her sister Jessica, six, in Margate, Kent. Lexi said: 'This is how we f**k it up' instead of 'fork it up' when she told her mother Victoria, 36, how to eat pasta

Alexandra 'Lexi' Gabriel, 4, (front) Victoria Gabriel, 29, Jessica Gabriel, 6, (far right) and Steve Gabriel, 44

Retail manager Victoria asks: 'This is how we do what, Lexi?'

Lexi repeats the mispronunciation and says: 'F**k it up.'

Shocked mother Victoria said: 'I really had to try not to laugh or make a bigger deal of her saying that word.

'Lexi and Jessica were having tagliatelle for the first time, and I was showing them how to twirl up pasta using a fork.

'I said to them both - 'this is how we fork it up'.

'Instead, Lexi said - 'look, this is how we f**k it up'.

'I had to correct her by emphasising the word 'fork' without giving it away..'

She added: 'Jessica is more laid-back, but Lexi is definitely the handful.

'If she'd caught on to what she was really saying, she'd still be using that word.'
description: Alexandra Gabriel, known as Lexi, four, mispronounces the word fork and accidentally drops the f-word as she described to her mother how she eats tagliatelle in Margate, Kent.
